title: Best of the Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Jamie Kilstein | 10/7/22
description:
Bill O’Reilly joins to give his weekly news recap, discussing the updates on Russia and Putin and the failed response from President Biden. Comedian Jamie Kilstein joins to discuss the Iranian woman beaten to death for showing her hair and the corporate media turning a blind eye to the issue.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
